did.unittitle: Smith-Houston-Ogden family papers. Mary Lewis Smith Estate papers (series 69)

bioghist.p: Mary Lewis Smith (1808-1892) was the wife of the judge, scientist, and state senator Dr. George L. Smith and the great grandmother of Lawrence M. C. Smith. Their children were Abraham Lewis (1831-1914), Mary (1834-1885), Rebecca (1836-1856), Margaretta (1838-1915), Benjamin Hayes (1841-1918), Clement Lawrence (1844-1909), George, Jr. (1846-1872), and Richard Hayes (1852-1856).

scopecontent.p: This collection relates primarily to the deportment of the estate of Mary Smith. Materials in the collection include correspondence between heirs; correspondence with Aronimink Corporation; correspondence with Franklin and Lindsay Construction Engineers and J.C. Taylor and Company; sales agreements; leases; receipts for repairs and upkeep to properties; and blueprints and land surveys. There is also some documentation related to the Margaretta Smith Estate.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
